column1: * 1911 - Swedish translator Åke Ohlmarks is born.
* 1930 - Author Marion Zimmer Bradley is born.
* 1947 - Voice actor Matthew Locricchio is born.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at wikipedia:Atlanta Symphony Hall
* 2005 - The Tolkien Gateway opens as wiki.
:There are no known events on this day.Category:Datesfi:3. kesäkuuta
